Detailed Description

Definitions for structures / routines for DMA list operations.

Define Documentation

#define ctk_dma_list_va_alloca_elems ( list,
max_elems   ) 

Value:

char _tmp_ ## list[ALIGN_UP((max_elems)*sizeof(ctk_dma_list_t), 8) + 8]; \
    (list)->elems = (void*)ALIGN_UP(_tmp_ ## list, 8);
Allocates the given number of DMA list elements and initializes the list.
Note:
the allocated DMA list is on the current stack frame and do not need to be freed. Notice that the elements cannot be accessed from outside of the current stack frame.
Parameters:
[in,out] list - the DMA list for which a memory buffer for DMA list elements is allocated.
[in] max_elems - the number of max list elements to be allocated.
See also:
ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems

ea_addr_t  ea,
size_t  size 
) [inline, static]

Adds (sets) a new DMA list element in the list. param[in,out] list - the DMA list to which an element is added param[in] ea - the starting EA addr of the DMA transfer to be added param[in] size - the size of the DMA transfer to be added

static void ctk_dma_list_get ( ctk_dma_list_t *  list,
int  tag 
) [inline, static]

DMA get operation (from EA to LS) using DMA list. param[in] list - the DMA list to be transfered.

Parameters:
[in] tag - DMA tag to be associated to the initiating transfer

static void ctk_dma_list_transfer ( ctk_dma_list_t *  list,
int  tag,
int  cmd 
) [inline, static]

Initiates a DMA transfer for the given DMA list. param[in] list - the DMA list to be transfered. The list must be initialized by ctk_dma_list_init (or by directly filling the structure members) and also have been added one or more ctk_dma_list_elem_t by ctk_dma_list_add_elem). param[in] tag - the MFC DMA tag param[in] cmd - the MFC DMA command

static void ctk_dma_list_va_add_elem ( ctk_dma_list_va_t *  list,
ea_addr_t  ea,
size_t  size 
) [inline, static]

Adds (sets) a new DMA list element in the ctk_dma_list_va_t list. param[in,out] list - the DMA list to which an element is added param[in] ea - the starting EA addr of the DMA transfer to be added param[in] size - the size of the DMA transfer to be added

static void ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems ( ctk_dma_list_va_t *  list,
int  max_elems 
) [inline, static]

Allocates the given number of DMA list elements for a DMA list.

Note:
the allocated DMA list should be freed by ctk_dma_list_va_free_elems.
Parameters:
[in,out] list - the DMA list for which a memory buffer for DMA list elements is allocated.
[in] max_elems - the number of max list elements to be allocated.
See also:
ctk_dma_list_va_alloca_elems

static void ctk_dma_list_va_free_elems ( ctk_dma_list_va_t *  list  )  [inline, static]

Frees memory of DMA list elements allocated by ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems.

Parameters:
[in] list - the DMA list for which the memory buffer for the list elements is freed.

static void ctk_dma_list_va_init ( ctk_dma_list_va_t *  list,
void *  ls_base,
ea_addr_t  ea_base 
) [inline, static]

Initializes the given ctk_dma_list_va_t.

Note:
the caller should also allocate a memory buffer for DMA list elements.
See also:
ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems, ctk_dma_list_va_alloca_elems param[in,out] list - the DMA list to be initialized param[in] ls_base - the LS base addr for the DMA list transfer param[in] ea_base - the EA base addr for the DMA list transfer

static void ctk_dma_list_va_transfer ( ctk_dma_list_va_t *  list,
int  tag,
int  cmd 
) [inline, static]

Initiates a DMA transfer for the given DMA list. param[in] list - the DMA list to be transfered. The list must be initialized by ctk_dma_list_va_init (or by directly filling the structure members) and also have been added one or more ctk_dma_list_elem_t by ctk_dma_list_va_add_elem). param[in] tag - the MFC DMA tag param[in] cmd - the MFC DMA command
